entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:59 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 10:06 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain late in the evening then to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
